alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Lynn Canal (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 02 at 6:00AM AKDT until June 02 at 9:00PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HIGH TEMPERATURES, LOW HUMIDITY, AND BREEZY CONDITIONS FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 019... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire weather zone 019. * WIND...Up to 15 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent with temperatures in the mid 80s on Thursday. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A warning means that severe fire weather conditions are already occurring or imminent in the warning area. Temperatures will warm rapidly through the morning. Breezy conditions will aid steep drops in humidity as well which will all enhance spread should fire develop. Confidence is high that red flag conditions develop by mid-day. These conditions may persist through Friday and an extension to this red flag warning may become necessary. Please advise the appropriate officials and fire crews in the field of this red flag warning. This statement will be updated by 9 PM AKDT Thursday or sooner if conditions warrant.
